Value.label: Click control mode for touch button 1
Value.Help: Click control mode for touch button 1

Item.label: Click function is disabled
Inverts relay state regarding touch button state
Inverts relay state regarding button backlight state
press the button and the relay goes to ON state only
press the button and the relay goes to OFF state only
Timer mode ON-OFF
Timer mode OFF-ON

Value.Help: Touch buttons sensitivity. 10=Supper sensitive. 60=lowest sensitivity.

Value.label: Gateway
Value.Help: If Fibaro Home Center Lite or Fibaro Home Center 2 is used as a gateway for correct communication of the devices set this parameter 1. For other gateways choose 0. Factory default value: 0.

Item.label: Default
Fibaro Home Center2
